events.name: PostCreated
events.description: Represents the creation of a new post, initiating the process.

events.name: PostUpdated
events.description: Represents the update of an existing post to reflect changes.

events.name: PostDeleted
events.description: Represents the deletion of a post from the system.

events.name: PostPublished
events.description: Indicates a post has been published and is available to users.

events.name: CommentAdded
events.description: Represents a comment being added to a post.

events.name: CommentDeleted
events.description: Indicates a comment has been removed from a post.

commands.name: CreatePost
commands.description: Represents the creation of a new post, initiating the process.

commands.name: UpdatePost
commands.description: Represents the update of an existing post to reflect changes.

commands.name: DeletePost
commands.description: Represents the deletion of a post from the system.

commands.name: PublishPost
commands.description: Indicates a post has been published and is available to users.

commands.name: AddComment
commands.description: Represents a comment being added to a post.

commands.name: DeleteComment
commands.description: Indicates a comment has been removed from a post.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the User Management context to handle post authorship.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with a notification service for alerts on post activities.

integrationPoints.name: AnalyticsService
integrationPoints.description: To track post engagement and user interaction.
